description:
When Keroro has Kululu come up with a spray that causes people to spill things carelessly, the roundabout invasion plan works too well, causing problematic spillages for everyone in the platoon, too. Later, Tamama is in the thick of an invasion by parasitic enemy aliens that look like soft serve ice cream.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Careless Saturated Operation! / Keroro, Invasion! Softglon of Terror
ケロロ うっかりビチョビチョ大作戦! であります / ケロロ 侵略! 恐怖のソフトグロン であります
